text.section:
The Commission shall:
establish a Real Estate Guaranty Fund; and
maintain the Guaranty Fund at a level of at least $250,000.

section.section: The Commission shall deposit all money collected to the credit of the Guaranty Fund with the State Treasurer for placement into a special account.
The State Treasurer may invest or reinvest money in the Guaranty Fund in the same manner as money in the State Retirement and Pension System.

text.section: The Commission may adopt regulations for the administration of a Guaranty Fund.
